directions: Stir together cream cheese, chutney, and mayonnaise, then transfer to small serving bowl.

Heat oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat until warm. Add walnuts, curry, and 1/4 teaspoon salt and toast, stirring frequently, about 3 minutes. Cool to warm, about 5 minutes, then spoon over dip.
ingredients: 1/2 cup to 3/4 cup pineapple mango chutney
title: Pineapple Mango Chutney Dip with Curried Walnuts
